name: Sticks & Stones (karmaturtle)
description:
WASD to Move, Left Click to Throw Stones, Right Click to Swing the Stick

Made with Nicholas Forrester's mood board in mind. Here are his mood board and his background.

I didn't not enjoy working with Nick's mood board. It was very vague, only really giving me direction towards using earth tones. The picture of a water park was confusing as it was used to show the mountains in the distance, not the actual water park. I would have liked to use his background but the art was not pleasing to look at. The trees in particular need a lot of work. I tried to use a similar background but a major bug with the camera prevented me from doing that.
